properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Endai na muuo
mukamwende Mwiai,
na kumuthukuma
misa ni nthelu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mukatavanyâ€™e uvoo -
wakwa mbai syonthe. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mukakusiie Mwiai -
kwa ndeto na meko. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na mwithiwe kyeni kwa andu -
a me kivinduni. x2

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tumanthe malondu mau -
tuete kanisani. x2

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Na twendane tondu Yesu -
mwene watwendie. x2
